pull.title: netbase: Use .data() instead of .c_str() on binary string
pull.body:
`.c_str()` is only guaranteed to return the data up to the first NUL character. This could break Socks5 negotiation on some platforms.

Also remove a few redundant c_str() in logging and formatting.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
netbase: Use .data() instead of .c_str() on binary string

`.c_str()` is only guaranteed to return the data up to the first NUL
character.

events.body:
ut ACT

Always good to remove .c_str() where not needed.

@Diapolo I'm sure you mean  #4879.
Mind if I just merge those into here, to cut down in the number of c_str related pulls?
